frontmatter.title: Benefits of upgrading to MAS on OpenShift

internal.content:
--- title: Benefits of upgrading to MAS on OpenShift --- - Operational cost reduction for clients Applications built on OpenShift® can be automatically deployed and updated as well as automatically managed and operated. This reduces the amount of time and money spent in IT environments. - Portability of workloads across disparate environments Workloads built in on OpenShift are portable across multiple public clouds and private cloud environments, providing flexibility in terms of where to deploy. - Leveraging industry's best Hybrid Cloud platform OpenShift is the world’s leading platform for portable hybrid cloud workloads. It is open source with a large ecosystem of tools ready for enterprise grade workloads. Full Whitepaper, [Visit Seismic](https://ibm.seismic.com/x5/doccenter.aspx?ContentId=726b7741-aea4-4505-b599-8f55905fdc9e#/doccenter/04a51f74-db09-43d5-a0f2-a39258a00912/doc/%252Fdd5034d8b3-6262-42b9-b680-6a858c90f4d1%252FdfOTRiYmU4NTQtNWY4NC03Y2QyLWZjYWUtOGIxYmFmZjkyZThk%252CPT0%253D%252CUXVpY2sgUmVmZXJlbmNlIEd1aWRlL0NvbnZlcnNhdGlvbiBHdWlkYW5jZQ%253D%253D%252Flf1f21bae6-83bb-4705-a2ca-afb27df446fd/grid/) **OpenShift Platform is: **
Open Hybrid Multicloud Managed Secure 
Open isn't just "Open Source." 
It's Open Standards, Open Data.
Client expect the platform to be
open for innovations in AI and
other computing model shifts.
 
Customers must be able to run 
the same application on-prem,
 in private cloud, in a public
cloud, or somewhere in between.
 
Infrastructure underneath the
platform must work together, 
regardless of vendor. Customers 
expect to run an application
in the infrastructure of their 
choosing, on their terms.
 
Client demand that the platform 
allow them to shift to incremental
 "day two" operations with ease.
 
Customers expect consistent
security across all layers
of the platform architecture,
from base infrastructure and
everything in-between.
![image](images/openshift.png)

- **Phase 1: Basic Installation:** Automated Provisioning - **Phase 2: Seemless Upgrades:** Automated Provisioning, Manual upgrades - **Phase 3: Full Lifecycle:** Automated Provisioning, Automated upgrades, Automated recovery - **Phase 4: Deep Insights:** Automated Provisioning, Automated upgrades, Automated recovery, Built-in monitoring - **Phase 5: Auto Pilot:** Automated Provisioning, Automated upgrades, Automated recovery, Built-in monitoring, Automated scaling ![image](images/redhat.png)
